no! stop buffing, and nerf assassins more! i won't be happy until all assassins are dead!

I do agree. I really hate assassins and believe that they should only be able to assassinate one champion only instead of being able to snowball enough to 1v5 pentakill the entire team.

And to add to my previous post below, people dont even **know** how to play tanks  let alone NOT focus the tank or the tanky bruiser in the front line in teamfights >.>

Let's be real here. If tanks don't get attacked AT ALL there's almost no real point to having tanks in the first place. Your job is to distract, zone and be a general nuisance while tanking whatever you can.

Assassins DO have the job of killing just the one person. Champs with resets have the job of mopping up fights and ks-ing everyone. Assassins build a lot of burst damage and are generally really squishy as a result.
It's almost april fools, we need urf back

Some of you please learn to read. Luden's Echo {{item:3285}} has only been removed from the Twisted Treeline and Crystal Scar because Needlessly Large Rod {{item:1058}} which is required for the build path, does not exist in those game modes.

For those of our community who don't know how to look for context, here's a simple tutorial:
You see that pretty picture above the {{item:3285}} post? It's called a header, you should read it. That means that all related text under it until the next header applies to the area it specifies.
AKA: {{item:3285}} Has been removed from Twisted Treeline and Crystal Scar **ONLY**. It's still in the game on Summoners Rift and Howling Abyss.
